attributes.action: All UK Citizens aught to have the right to vote in Brexit, come a referendum.
attributes.additional_details:
Europe has witnessed months of wrangling and the recent years plainly demonstrate the complexity of the matter. The 3 years, not wasted, but clarified what is at stake. The livelihood of many families and people are at risk on all sides of the water. So it is wise to not rush into any gambit deal.
As a Brit living in Europe I also request the British Government permit and accept my and the vote of other UK Citizens in this most controversial issue our Nation is now confronted with.
attributes.background: A true democracy includes all citizens who are directly effected by a vote. British Citizens residing in Europe and have done so for over 15 years are denied a voting voice over a decision that directly impacts their lives. Brits who believe in European integration have been ignored.
